text: Oleg Bryzhak (October 27, 1960 â€“ March 24, 2015) was a Kazakhstani-German bass-baritone opera singer. He was born in Jezkazgan, Kazakh SSR. Bryzhak had been a protodeacon in a Ukrainian Orthodox church in Krefeld. Bryzhak died on March 24, 2015 along with fellow singer Maria Radner in the Germanwings Flight 9525 crash in France. He was returning from performances of Richard Wagner's Siegfried at the Gran Teatre del Liceu in Barcelona. ==References== ==Other websites== *Oleg Bryzhak's website Category:1960 births Category:2015 deaths Category:German singers Category:German musicians
title: Oleg Bryjak
